text: palamu wataya tha.54.14 yi.

upadhiya laba ganimen pasu kalayak yanathuruma ohuta rakiyawak soyagatha nohaki wiya.tiyushan guruwarayaku lesa pasal sisunta iganwima keti kalayak kala namuth wishaya nirdeshayanta baharawa tharaka widyawa ha ee dakwa wisadum nolabunu widya kshethrayan pilibadawa sisunwa yomu karawima nisama demapiyan ohuge sewaya prathikshepa kalaha.thamange daruwange oluwata wikara adahas athulath karanneku lesa demapiyan ohuwa salakuha.anathuruwa thama pasal mithurakuge udawu athiwa petant balapathra karyalayaka lipikaru rakiyawak laba gaththeya.rakiyawa karana athara thuradi widya sangara aadiyata lipi liwima ohuge puruddak wiya.

ohuge maranayen wasara 3 kata pasuwa 1949 di prakashanaya karana lada “mathaka satahan dekak” hi kens siya aachara dharma padanama pahadili karayi. 1938 di liyana lada eka mathaka satahanak, tharunayek hatiyata wayasa wisse di wisiwani siyawase prathama dashakaye di hethema kembrij wishwa widyalaye di igena ganna samaye di ohuge “mul wishwasa” hadune kesedayi wimasa balayi. ji. ee. muwar darshanakiyage rachana thulin ohu saha kembrij hi thawath boho tharuna widwathun balapamata pathrawi sitiyaha.

sharira saubyaya durwalawima saha maranayasanskaranaya warsha 1983 romaye di dewana jon pawulu pap wahanse baha dakimata gos sitiyadi theresa mawuthumiya hrudyabadayakata lak wuwaya.1989 di dewana waratath aya hrudyabadhayakata lak wu pasu ayata kruthima hruda spandhana upakaranayak labini.eheth 1991 di balawath niwumoniya rogayakin pelunu ayata hruda rogayada balawath wiya.ehi di aya mishanaringe sangamaye adhipathi thanathuren,illa aswimata thath kalada,anekuth kanya sohoyuriyan rahasigathawa pawath wu chandayakin aya ehi thawa duratath randi sitiya yuthu bawa thiranaya kerunu heyin eyata aya ekanga wuwaya.[50] 1996 aprel masa siduwu watimakin ayage urahis ataya bindi giyeya.agosthu masa aya maleriya rogayen pida windi athara hrudaye wam kutiraye kriyakarithwayada adapana wiya.

lingika suluthara prajawa thamange purawasibhawayen artha nirupanaya kala yuthu athara, eya sidu wiya yuththe mema thani nithi kandaya haraha nowana athara, ema karanaya rata pura sitina wiwidha panthi, jathi saha aarthika mattamwalata ayath wena samakami, dwilingika, sankranthika samajabhawi, antharlingika, saha lingika sammathayangen paribahira pudgalayanta balapayi. 365 saha 365 (a) nithi kanda yatathe kisiwaku ath adanguwata gena, nadu pawara nathi bawata rajyaya tharka karana wita pawa, wadihitiyan athara kamaththen sidu wana lingika kriya aparadha bawata path kirima, lingika suluthara prajawa matha thani saha bahuwidha wena balapam athi karayi.

shan rajawanshaya (kri.pu. 1600–1046 pamana)sanskaranaya shan rajawansha samayata ayath diwas asthi pradhana lipiya: shan rajawanshaya wadidura thorathuru: china lokada yugaya aganuwara: yin, anyan asala kri.pu. 1600 – 1046 kalaye di shan rajawanshaye pawathma gana kiyawena purawidyathmaka soya ganim kotas dekaki.
